en: The girl has a soft heart.

en: The translation was true to the original.

en: The translation is quite true to the original.

en: The translation is true to the original.

en: The translation was nicely true to the original.

en: The bookshelf is built in.

en: Did you read the whole book?

en: Please send the book by mail.

en: I'll send the book by mail.

en: I must get the book back from him.

zh: 我想买那本书，但发现身上只有不到200日元。

en: I tried to read through the book, which I found impossible.

en: I got a lot out of that book I read.

en: Give me back the book after you have read it.

en: You've read through the book, haven't you?

en: While reading the book, I felt asleep.

en: Few people seem to have read the book.

en: Having read the book, I could answer all the questions.

en: I remember reading the book.

en: When you're done with the book, put it back where you found it.

en: Put the book back on the shelf when you're through with it.

en: Put the book back on the shelf.

en: I'd like to place an order for the book with the publishing company.

en: You may take the book.

en: Put the book back in the same place where you found it.

en: There is no hurry about returning the book to me.
zh: 不急着把书还给我。

en: Give the book back to the owner.
zh: 把书还给主人。

en: Put the book on the desk.
zh: 把书放在桌子上。

en: Read the book again and again.
zh: 把那本书反复多读几遍。

en: You may borrow this book as long as you keep it clean.
zh: 只要你能爱护好这本书，就可以借走。

en: Put the book back where it was.
zh: 把书放回原位。

en: Put the book where you found it.
zh: 把书放回你找到它的地方。

en: Have you finished reading the book?
zh: 你看完那本书了吗？

en: Put the book back where you found it.
zh: 把书放回原处。

en: Give me the book.
zh: 把书给我。

en: Bring the book to me, not to Tom.
zh: 把书拿给我，别给汤姆。

en: Please put the book on the shelf.
zh: 请把书放到架子上。

en: Where did you buy that book?
zh: 那本书你是在哪儿买的？

en: It was Mr Hino who translated the book from Spanish into Japanese.
zh: 是日野先生把那本书从西班牙语翻译成日语的。

en: You'll find both of the books interesting.
zh: 你会觉得这两本书都挺有意思的。

en: Did you find the book interesting?
zh: 你觉得那本书有意思吗？

en: I'm afraid the book is beyond the reach of his understanding.
zh: 我担心那本书他看不懂。

en: He sent me a letter asking if the book had reached me.
zh: 他给我写了封信，问我有没有收到那本书。

en: I found the book very interesting.
zh: 我觉得那本书非常有意思。

en: Are you through with the book?
zh: 这本书你看完了吗？

en: This book is easy to read.
zh: 这本书挺好读的。

en: Who was the book written by?
zh: 这本书是谁写的？

en: You'll find that book in the historical section of the library.
zh: 你在图书馆的历史区能找到那本书。

en: You'll find the book in the library.
zh: 你在图书馆能找到那本书。

en: That book is familiar to all young children.
zh: 小孩子们都很熟悉那本书。

en: Parts of the book are quite good.
zh: 这本书里的有些部分写得挺好的。

en: I found the book so interesting that I kept on reading it until daybreak.
zh: 我觉得那本书太有意思了，一口气读到了天亮。

en: Sorry, the book is out of stock.
zh: 抱歉，那本书没货了。

en: I read the book in my second year of high school.
zh: 我高二的时候读过那本书。

en: I have read the book before.
zh: 我以前读过那本书。

en: What is necessary is just to read the book, when free.
zh: 有空的时候读读那本书就行。

en: I have already read the book.
zh: 我已经读过那本书了。

en: Have you done with the book?
zh: 那本书你看完了没？

en: That book had a lot of pages.
zh: 那本书页数挺多的。

en: None of the books are instructive.
zh: 这些书里没一本是有教育意义的。

en: Where is the book?
zh: 书在哪儿呢？

en: They have demanded that all copies of the book be destroyed.
zh: 他们要求销毁那本书的所有副本。

en: I found the book interesting.
zh: 我觉得那本书挺有意思的。

en: That book may be obtained at a moment's notice.
zh: 那本书随时都能弄到。

en: This book is interesting, also instructive.
zh: 这本书既有意思又能学到东西。

en: Was the book interesting?
zh: 那本书有意思吗？

en: Put the book on the top shelf.
zh: 把书放在最上面的架子上。

en: Put the book on the bottom shelf.
zh: 把书放在最下面的架子上。

en: It is said that the book is a bestseller in Britain.
zh: 听说那本书在英国很畅销。

en: There are pictures on alternate pages of the book.
zh: 那本书每隔一页就有插图。

en: The more you read the book, the less you will understand it.
zh: 这本书你越读越糊涂。

en: It is worthwhile to read the book.
zh: 这本书值得一读。

en: There is a definite time to return the book.
zh: 还书是有期限的。

en: Orders for the book poured in.
zh: 那本书的订单一下子涌了进来。

en: The price of the book was $5.
zh: 那本书卖5美元。

en: The principal theme of the book is the American Revolution.
zh: 这本书的主题是美国独立战争。

en: You can omit the last chapter of the book.
zh: 你可以跳过这本书的最后一章。

en: I copied a passage from the book into my notebook.
zh: 我从书里抄了一段话到笔记本上。

en: Two pages of the book stuck together.
zh: 书里的两页粘到一块儿了。

en: You may take either of the books.
zh: 这两本书你拿哪本都行。

en: What is the title of the book?
zh: 这本书叫什么名字？

en: Not all of the books are instructive.
zh: 这些书并不全都有教育意义。

en: There were some ink spots on the book jacket.
zh: 书封套上有几个墨水点。
